column5: Feb 19 A Paraguayan judge rejected on Tuesday a request by soy farmers to block Monsanto Co  from collecting royalty payments for use of the biotech company's Roundup Ready seeds in the world's fourth largest soybean exporter.U.S. justices hostile to farmer's argument against Monsanto WASHINGTON
column6: Feb 19 U.S. Supreme Court justices signaled on Tuesday that agribusiness giant Monsanto Co  was in a strong position to claim that an Indiana farmer violated its patent for a type of soybean.

column2: TSYS to buy NetSpend for $1.4 billionUPDATE 3-Payment processor TSYS to buy NetSpend for $1.4 billion * TSYS expects deal to add to EPS for first 12 months after close  UPDATE 3-Payment processor TSYS to buy NetSpend for $1.4 billion * TSYS expects deal to add to EPS for first 12 months after close Feb 19 TSYS said it will buy prepaid debit card provider NetSpend Holdings Inc for about $1.4 billion in cash.UPDATE 3-Payment processor TSYS to buy NetSpend for $1.4 billion * TSYS expects deal to add to EPS for first 12 months after close
